an4.104:4.3: ~One is shallow but appears deep, ~one is deep but appears shallow, ~one is shallow and appears shallow, and ~one is deep and appears deep.
an4.104:4.5: In the same way, these four people similar to lakes are found in the world.
an4.104:4.7: ~One is shallow but appears deep, ~one is deep but appears shallow, ~one is shallow and appears shallow, and ~one is deep and appears deep.
an4.104:5.1: And how is a person shallow but appears deep?
an4.104:5.2: It’s when a person is impressive when going out and coming back, when looking ahead and aside, when bending and extending the limbs, and when bearing the outer robe, bowl and robes.
an4.104:5.3: But they don’t really understand: ‘This is suffering’ … ‘This is the origin of suffering’ … ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ … ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
an4.104:5.4: That’s how a person is shallow but appears deep.
an4.104:5.5: That person is like a lake that’s shallow but appears deep, I say.
an4.104:6.1: And how is a person deep but appears shallow?
an4.104:6.2: It’s when a person is not impressive …
an4.104:6.3: And they really understand: ‘This is suffering’ …
an4.104:7.1: And how is a person shallow and appears shallow?
an4.104:7.2: It’s when a person is not impressive …
an4.104:7.3: Nor do they really understand: ‘This is suffering’ …
an4.104:8.1: And how is a person deep and appears deep?
an4.104:8.2: It’s when a person is impressive …
an4.104:8.3: And they really understand: ‘This is suffering’ …
an4.104:8.7: These four people similar to lakes are found in the world.”
